attribute.name: itemClass
attribute.description: The CSS class of closed navigation items.

attribute.name: openItemClass
attribute.description: The CSS class of open navigation items.

attribute.name: activeItemClass
attribute.description: The CSS class of the active navigation item.

attribute.name: separatorClass
attribute.description: The CSS class for the td element of a separator.

attribute.name: itemStyle
attribute.description: The CSS Style of closed navigation items.

attribute.name: openItemStyle
attribute.description: The CSS Style of open navigation items.

attribute.name: activeItemStyle
attribute.description: The CSS Style of the active navigation item.

attribute.name: separatorStyle
attribute.description: The CSS Style for the td element of a separator.

attribute.name: expandAll
attribute.description: If set to true all Items are expanded from the beginning and never closed.

attribute.name: renderAll
attribute.description: If set to true all Items are rendered and other methods, like CSS should be used to hide them as necesary
